snippet: Prosecutors must state within a week whether they are ready to proceed to the trial of Uhuru Kenyatta. If they do not, charges will be dropped.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors must state within a week whether they are ready to proceed to the trial of Uhuru Kenyatta. If they do not, charges will be dropped.

headline.main: Hague Judges Set a Deadline in Case of Kenyan President

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
